name: Blockle
description:
Blockle is multiplayer physics-based tower dismantling game. Each turn, you must carefully remove a block without causing the whole tower to come crashing down. The last player to successfully remove a block without the tower falling is the winner!Features
  • Physics-based gameplay
  • Throw blocks around, get drunk, and flip off your friends
  • Online and local multiplayer, up to 6 players
  • Controller support (may require official or third party drivers)

Online multiplayer population may be low. Bring your own friends!
